name: p2p-git-portal-wasi
description: A Git Portal running from peer-to-peer storage
author: happybeing

scripts.build: rm -f public/wasm/* && yarn build-wasm-bindgen && yarn build-app
scripts.build-wasm-bindgen: yarn build-wasm && wasm-bindgen --no-typescript src/wasi-rust/target/wasm32-wasi/release/wasi-gitportal.wasm --browser --out-dir . && yarn wbg-to-wasi && mv *.wasm public/wasm/ && mv wasi-* src
scripts.dev-wasm-bindgen: yarn dev-wasm && wasm-bindgen --no-typescript src/wasi-rust/target/wasm32-wasi/debug/wasi-gitportal.wasm --debug --keep-debug  --out-dir . && yarn wbg-to-wasi && mv *.wasm public/wasm/ && mv wasi-* src
scripts.watch-wasm-bindgen: while true ; do inotifywait -qm --event modify @src/wasi-rust/target -r --format '' src/wasi-rust/ | yarn dev-wasm-bindgen; done
